title: Stage 4 Liver Cancer Explained as Rinku Singh’s Father Passes Away
desc: Rinku Singh lost his father, Karanchand Singh, to Stage 4 liver cancer in Greater Noida after his condition worsened and he was placed on ventilator support. Advanced liver cancer, or metastatic liver cancer, spreads beyond the liver, carries low survival rates, and often shows symptoms only in later stages. , Health, Times Now

title: NSW teen camping death from red meat allergy a near world-first
desc: Jeremy Webb, 16, died after after eating a dinner of beef sausages while camping with friends on the NSW Central Coast.

title: Gregg Wallace and BBC settle damages claim
desc: Court documents state the claim against the BBC and BBC Studios has been "discontinued".

title: Why Commonwealth Bank’s $1 billion suspected loan fraud should change how we bank and do business
desc: If you’re one of CommBank’s 17 million customers, don’t panic. But given how well AI can now fake documents, all banks will need to rethink their security.

title: Son of ‘Gasoline Godfather’ Jailed in Indonesia Graft Case
desc: The son of a reclusive oil merchant who dominated Indonesia’s fuel trade for decades received a prison sentence as part of a $17 billion corruption case centered on the country’s state-owned energy firm.

title: BDO bottom line up 6% in 2025
desc: Sy-led BDO Unibank Inc. reported a 6% growth in its earnings for 2025, its customer lending business posted double-digit growth across all market segments during the year.
